title: Asking a bank to reverse an overdraft fee
context: Politely ask the teller to waive the penalty charge on your account.

content.bestLine: Could you please waive the overdraft fee on my account?

neutral.text: I'd like to request a fee waiver
Can you help with the overdraft charge?
I'm hoping to get the fee reversed
Is it possible to waive the penalty?
I'd appreciate it if you could waive the fee
Can you look into waiving the overdraft fee?
I'm asking to have the fee removed
Could you please review the overdraft charge?

formal.text: I respectfully request a waiver of the overdraft fee
Could you assist me in having the fee waived?
I would like to formally request a reversal of the overdraft charge
Is it feasible to have the penalty fee waived?
I am requesting your assistance in waiving the overdraft fee
Could you please consider waiving the overdraft fee on my account?

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Hi, I'd like to speak with someone about an overdraft fee on my account

lines.speaker: Teller
lines.text: Of course, let me see what I can do. Can you please tell me more about the issue?
